task_definition_name: Update Events On Mifos Calendar for Cooperative Credit Unions
description:
This task involves updating our current calendar with the dates/times for events that we’ve participated in the past as well as researching and adding new events. it  centers around HFOSS-related events such as OSCON, ApacheCon, etc. Update the appropriate section of this sheet ( https://goo.gl/gPqHhj)

Please also add to the Mifos Community Calendar at http://mifos.org/resources/community/calendar/

To do so, once you've claimed the task, request access to the calendar from your mentor or Ed Cable
